1249270.name: Physics Based Golf
1249270.description:
Help Us Play Test!

Join our discord server for free instant access to Closed Alpha Testing. Help by giving feedback and sharing your game ideas!

Description

Physics Based Golf is an indie physics-based golf simulator that covers ALL aspects of the real sport.

Walk or drive your golf cart to the ball and use your rangefinder to gain distance information. From there it's up to you to choose the right club and execute the perfect swing using your mouse.

Play by yourself or with up to 3 friends online.

Current Planned Features:

  • Detailed Character and Golf Club models
  • Controller Support
  • Swing Animations
  • Character Customization
  • Full Challenging 18-hole course
  • Alternate Par 3 Chip & Putt Course
  • Alternate Minigolf Course
1249270.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
